title: Digital Learning Experiences and Reflective Practices in Higher Education During the Pandemic Era

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Course strengthening educational design capabilities through reflective practice methodologies, where pre-service teachers share digital education cases experienced during the pandemic

learning_goals: Participants will identify practical challenges in digital learning environments and develop solution strategies by applying a reflective practice framework
Participants will propose at least three learner engagement strategies when designing blended learning programs
Participants will analyze real educational case studies from pandemic periods and apply insights to future crisis-responsive instructional design
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
